paragraphs.paragraph: I have an undergraduate degree at Digital Design at Instituto Infnet and work with technology and web application development at ANBIMA.
Being passionate about design, technology and innovation , I try to be up to date on news and trends about web.

activitities.activitity: Translation of wireframes and interfaces into code;
Interaction with Designers, PO’s and PM’s
Interação com Designers, PO’s e PM’s to predict and solve problema between Design and implementation;
Strategies definition for behavior of interfaces and features;
Pull Requests reviews focused on development patterns and good practices;
Management and control of repositories and branches on GitHub and workspaces on VTEX IO.

company.name: ANBIMA (Rio de Janeiro and São Paulo, Brazil)

activitities.activitity: Development and leadership projects with partners using agile methodologies;
Relationship with business areas for translation into technical requirements;
Digital interfaces validation focused on UX and UI;
Code review aiming performance and good practices;
Interface customization and developement focused on CMS;
Creation and review of wireframes, from low to high-fidelity.
